prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is designed to be a strict subset of markdown, easy to read and write, and understandable by both humans and machines without specific knowledge of the language. It uses .book.md or .book file extensions with UTF-8 non-BOM encoding.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
